command: [withheld — non-actionable: would bind an IPv4 UDP socket to an APIPA/isolated adapter address and send base64-encoded chunks to a peer on an uncommon UDP port with low TTL]
explanation: Leverages a non-routed/alternate interface (APIPA) and UDP to move data out-of-band relative to the primary egress path, mapping to T1011.
rationale_steps: Select an alternate local interface distinct from the default route
Use IPv4 UDP with a constrained TTL
Chunk and send to a high, uncommon destination port
Ensure no global network settings are altered
